name: UITitlebarToolbarStyle
desc: Styles that determine the toolbar’s appearance and location related to the title bar.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A style indicating that the system determines the toolbar’s appearance and location.

items.name: case expanded
items.desc: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title.

items.name: case preference
items.desc: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title with toolbar items centered in the toolbar.

items.name: case unified
items.desc: A style indicating that the toolbar appears inline with the window title.

items.name: case unifiedCompact
items.desc: A style indicating that the toolbar appears inline with the window title and with reduced margins to allow more focus on the window’s contents.
